str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sound a trumpet. From salpigx; to trumpet, i.e. Sound a blast.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Four. Or neuter tessara a plural number; four.
From a primary kar; a horn.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Golden, made of gold, adorned with gold. From chrusos; made of gold.
An altar (for sacrifice). From a derivative of thusia; a place of sacrifice, i.e. An altar.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
